alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Goshen County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 12:50PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Goshen and northeastern Laramie Counties through 115 PM MDT... At 1250 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Meriden Rest Area to 12 miles north of Ranchettes to near Whitaker. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitaker, Hawk Springs Recreation Area, Meriden Rest Area, Hawk Springs Campground, Gun Barrel and Hawk Springs. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 25 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Goshen County; South Laramie Range Foothills
